name: Ying Mao
personality: Quiet and reserved, but fiercely loyal and protective of family and comrades.
story: Shun Hsiang grew up in a small village in rural China. As a young man, he joined the People's Liberation Army and quickly proved himself to be a skilled marksman. After several successful tours of duty, he was recruited into an elite special forces unit, where he honed his skills as an autorifleman. Despite being separated from his wife and children for long periods of time, Shun remains dedicated to his military duty and to his family, whom he misses deeply. He looks forward to returning home one day and reuniting with his loved ones.
